channel.title: Troubles with ints
channel.description: Hey, I have been attempting to edit the ints to make a spined helm just plain black. I have tried a couple of times, trying different things. But either way, I don't know the color ID for black. Plus, my item8.java doesn't have spined helm ints, only ints of new items. I am kind of clueless in client editing... so if any one has a link to a tutorial or something. any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Troubles with ints
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Hey, I have been attempting to edit the ints to make a spined helm just plain black. I have tried a couple of times, trying different things. But either way, I don’t know the color ID for black. Plus, my item8.java doesn’t have spined helm ints, only ints of new items. I am kind of clueless in client editing… so if any one has a link to a tutorial or something. any help would be appreciated.
